thread.title: Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, and Migos Team for New Single “Slide”
thread.title_full: Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, and Migos Team for New Single “Slide”

author: Noah Yoo
title: Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, and Migos Team for New Single “Slide”
text:
Frank Ocean, Calvin Harris, and Migos Team for New Single “Slide” Harris has been teasing the new song on his Snapchat Ocean photo by Jason Merritt/Getty Images; Harris photo by Samir Hussein/WireImage 
Calvin Harris , Frank Ocean , and Migos have come together for a new song, “Slide.” It will mark Ocean’s first piece of new music since the release of Blonde ; while there is no concrete release date for the full track, Harris has been teasing the new song on his Snapchat account, and shared details about the song on his Twitter account. Listen to a snippet from “Slide” below. CALVIN HARRIS // FRANK OCEAN // MIGOS pic.twitter.com/UvsJzm9F6k — Calvin Harris (@CalvinHarris) February 21, 2017 Calvin Harris x Frank x Migos pic.twitter.com/PTZbpjgCSs — Frank Ocean Daily (@TeamFrankDaily) February 21, 2017 Artists In This Story
